item.title: Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Supper Show- ALL U CAN EAT
item.description: Ramp up the holiday spirit with a ticket to YO HO at Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Christmas Show in Pigeon Forge. Sing along to your favorite holiday tunes while watching real lumberjacks participate in friendly competitions like sawing, log rolling, and speed climbing. After the show, you can compete in your own challenges in the onsite adventure park.

image.alt: Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Supper Show- ALL U CAN EAT

item.title: Rocky Top Mountain Coaster Admission Ticket in Pigeon Forge
item.description: Zip through Tennessee's Great Smoky Mountains on a mountain coaster with this admission ticket. Navigate several twists, turns, and drops through the lush forest landscape and take in the mountain scenery while you ride. For the more adventurous, take the coaster at night and enjoy a fun ride through the mountains while it's lit up.

image.alt: Rocky Top Mountain Coaster Admission Ticket in Pigeon Forge

item.title: The Escape Game Pigeon Forge: 60-Minute Adventures on The Island
item.description: Test your analytical skills while having lots of fun with your friends with an escape game. You'll follow a set of clues to help you complete your mission, with only an hour to 'escape'--or not. You'll get to choose from five different immersive games, ranging from a gold-hunting experience to a mars mission.

image.alt: The Escape Game Pigeon Forge: 60-Minute Adventures on The Island

item.title: Crave Golf Club - Two Courses of Mini Golf
item.description: Indulge your sweet tooth at Crave Golf Club, where dreams of playing golf in a real-life Candy Land come true. Immerse yourself in a unique miniature golf experience with a candy-themed course that winds its way to the rooftop. Enjoy 38 holes plus mini-bowling, escape rooms, and a candy store to satisfy all your sugary cravings.

image.alt: Crave Golf Club - Two Courses of Mini Golf

item.title: Admission Ticket: Brian Hoffman's Remembering Red - A Tribute to Red Skelton
item.description: Enjoy a performance of ‘Remembering Red – A Tribute to Red Skelton’ at the Red Skelton Tribute Theater in Pigeon Forge. This family-friendly comedy show is performed by Brian Hoffman, who brings to life memories of the Golden Age of television as he re-creates Red Skelton’s characters and jokes. Before the show starts, get into the spirit of the era with a video about celebrities, music and more from the 1950s, ‘60s and ‘70s.

image.alt: Admission Ticket: Brian Hoffman's Remembering Red - A Tribute to Red Skelton

item.title: Wine Me, Shine Me, Dine Me - Must do tour
item.description: Tennessee is known for its whiskey and moonshine, but sampling at distilleries is hard if you don't have a designated driver or a car. This Pigeon Forge Wine, Whiskey, and Moonshine Tour mixes a bit of Appalachian culture with visits to two popular distilleries, and it takes the hassle away of figuring out rides, too. An easy-to-find meeting spot in Pigeon Forge and bottled water are provided for a seamless day.

image.alt: Wine Me, Shine Me, Dine Me - Must do tour

item.title: 1 Day Jeep Rental Through the Smoky Mountains
item.description: Embark on a self guided tour through the Smoky Mountains driving a Jeep Wrangler Unlimited. After you pick up your vehicle, you’ll get into the Great Smoky Mountain National Park in your soft-topped, air conditioned jeep. You have the used of the jeep from morning through to the next morning, so you can explore Cataloochee Valley, Fontana Lake and Dam, Cades Cove, and more, all at your leisure.

image.alt: 1 Day Jeep Rental Through the Smoky Mountains

item.title: Crave Golf Club - One Course of Mini Golf
item.description: Mini golf gets a sweet twist on this Candyland-themed course in Pigeon Forge. Put your way through locations like Bubblegum Garden and Ice Cream Canyon, each decorated with details like giant gummy bears and cupcake pillars that bring the course to life. When you need a break, swing by the milkshake bar or candy store for a sweet snack.

image.alt: Crave Golf Club - One Course of Mini Golf

item.title: TopJump Trampoline & Extreme Arena - 90 MIN UNLIMITED FUN
item.description: Enjoy a smooth visit to Sevier County’s first-ever trampoline park, by pre-booking your time slot. With your admission booked, you can simply enjoy all of the traditional trampoline park attractions, plus the nation’s first sky-high climbing adventure, and much more. Guests can also enjoy activities like dodgeball and open jump as well as a large video arcade.

image.alt: TopJump Trampoline & Extreme Arena - 90 MIN UNLIMITED FUN

item.title: Smoky Mountains Roaring Fork Guided Sightseeing Tour by Jeep
item.description: Relax in the arms of Mother Nature on this guided jeep tour of the Smoky Mountains. Take about a half day to explore all the woodlands and water features that make up the Roaring Fork Motor Nature Trail. Max group size is 10, so a small group tour. Explore the American Frontier with nearly 200 years of history.

image.alt: Smoky Mountains Roaring Fork Guided Sightseeing Tour by Jeep

item.title: East Tennessee Off Road ATV Guided Experience
item.description: Whether you’re an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) novice or a seasoned off-roader, enjoy thrills and spills under the eye of an instructor/guide on this Pigeon Forge adventure. Riding your own solo ATV, roar up to a high bluff with valley views and down to a messy mudhole (immersion optional). Numbers are limited to 10, ensuring personal attention and minimal waiting around.

image.alt: East Tennessee Off Road ATV Guided Experience

item.title: Small-Group Jeep Tour of Smoky Mountains Foothills Parkway
item.description: Check out one of the most scenic drives in America on this approximately three hour jeep tour along the Foothills Parkway in the Smoky Mountains. This is a small group tour, so you’ll keep costs down by sharing your vehicle. But you’ll still have excellent views, several stops for photos, and a fun family-friendly all terrain ride.

image.alt: Small-Group Jeep Tour of Smoky Mountains Foothills Parkway

item.title: Unbelievable Magic Show - Starring Steven Best
item.description: Discover the fun of a magic show during your trip to Pigeon Forge, Tennessee with an admission ticket to see Steven Best. Attend a family-friendly comedy and magic show at the Smoky Mountain Theatre and watch star Steven Best perform his tricks. Skip-the-line access is included and magic fans may want to check out the on-site magic shop as well.

image.alt: Unbelievable Magic Show - Starring Steven Best

item.title: Smoky Mountains Newfound Gap Jeep Tour
item.description: Take in the extraordinary forest ecosystems of the Great Smoky Mountains while getting your adrenaline flowing on this extreme jeep tour through Newfound Gap. Your guide will take you in an open-air jeep from Pigeon Forge uphill to the nearly mile-high Gap, and then back down to base. Along the way, you’ll learn about the history and geography of this remarkable wild land.

image.alt: Smoky Mountains Newfound Gap Jeep Tour

item.title: Cash & The King: Tribute to Elvis and Johnny Cash
item.description: Your favorite performers may be gone, but their spirits live on in Pigeon Forge. With tickets to "Elvis! Tribute to the King" you’ll kick back and relax with one of the world's most famous musicians—Elvis Presley. Even if you’ve seen the show before, the lineup changes, and every night is a roaring fun time.

image.alt: Cash & The King: Tribute to Elvis and Johnny Cash

item.title: Pigeon Forge: Country Tonite Show Admission Ticket
item.description: Unlike other shows in the area, Country Tonite in Pigeon Forge makes a perfect family night out. Not only is the show great for all ages, but all children 12 and under get in free, too. Hear songs from old country favorites to gospel to modern hits and even patriotic anthems. There is also a concession area to purchase food and drinks to make sure the whole family stays happy throughout the show.

image.alt: Pigeon Forge: Country Tonite Show Admission Ticket

item.title: $100 Arcade City Pigeon Forge Play Card (+$45)
item.description: Arcade City in Pigeon Forge, Tennessee features a mix of arcades, video games, and entertainment for the whole family to enjoy. Get the most bang for your buck when you purchase this $100 play card and receive an extra $45 to spend on games. Use your ticket winnings to get all sorts of prizes, from toys to electronics.

image.alt: $100 Arcade City Pigeon Forge Play Card (+$45)

item.title: Beyond The Lens Interactive Museum Admission Ticket
item.description: Technology and entertainment collide at the interactive Beyond the Lens Museum in Pigeon Forge, Tennessee. Visit over 150 exhibits that combine games and pop culture for a fun-filled day out. Walk the red carpet, get an inside look at the Royal Family, play augmented reality and VR games, hunt for Bigfoot, and much more at the huge complex.

image.alt: Beyond The Lens Interactive Museum Admission Ticket

item.title: $20 Arcade City Pigeon Forge Play Card (+$5)
item.description: Get extra value at Arcade City in Pigeon Forge with this discount play card. Visit this popular arcade and play a variety of games with a play card worth $25 (you pay $20). Try your hand at a long list of arcade games and try to win prizes. Stretch your money with this Arcade City discount card and make the most of your trip to Pigeon Forge, Tennessee.

image.alt: $20 Arcade City Pigeon Forge Play Card (+$5)

item.title: 2 Day Jeep Rental
item.description: Rent a Jeep Wrangler Unlimited for two days, which comes with a self-guided itinerary, so that you and up to four more adventurers can explore the best places to see in Pigeon Forge. The tour goes through the Great Smoky Mountain National Park to see several sights there. Jeeps have soft tops and can have open doors if you like. The route is on and off paved roads, so you’ll have all kinds of driving fun.

image.alt: 2 Day Jeep Rental

item.title: Marriage Can Be Murder
item.description: A night at the Great Smoky Mountain Murder Mystery Dinner Show in Pigeon Forge is one to be remembered. Get right in the middle of all the action in solving a murder that occurred on Michael and Lisa's wedding day with this ticket. Enjoy a 3-course country-style meal while watching the story and clues unfold and help solve the murder before the night is over.

image.alt: Marriage Can Be Murder

item.title: Winterfest Scenic Evening Tour
item.description: A great way to discover Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg in our open-air, heated Jeeps. This breathtaking, narrated scenic light tour will delight your senses and warm your hearts with small groups or families creating memories worth repeating. We depart from our office in Pigeon Forge and head south toward Gatlinburg to view the twinkling light displays. Discover a breathtaking view of Gatlinburg from above. As we make our way back through Pigeon Forge we wind through each lighted bridge and discover the stories told with each light display in town.

image.alt: Winterfest Scenic Evening Tour

item.title: Hard Rock Cafe Pigeon Forge Meal
item.description: The mountains aren’t the only things that are smoky when visiting Pigeon Forge, as Hard Rock Cafe’s hickory smoked ribs take the flavor of the mountains and put it on your plate - along with dessert and a drink. At the Hard Rock Cafe Pigeon Forge, choose from a menu of American classics like steaks, cheeseburgers and salmon and order from a menu with meals that are themed on American styles of music. Wander the restaurant’s decorated interior and test your musical knowledge, while enjoying a meal based different music styles.

image.alt: Hard Rock Cafe Pigeon Forge Meal

item.title: Smoky Mtn, Sevierville, Dandridge Douglas Dam & Bush's Bean Tour
item.description: This tour leaves every Wednesday from Country Tonite Theater after a 30-minute Smart Phone Photo Workshop. The tour to Sevierville, Dandridge, Douglas Lake and Dam, and Bush's Baked Beans offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and natural beauty. Whether you're a photography enthusiast or a traveler looking to explore the hidden gems of the Smoky Mountains, this tour provides an unforgettable experience. Lunch at Bush's Cafe. The combination of a Smart Phone Photo Workshop, expert guidance, picturesque locations, and comfortable travel ensures a delightful and enriching day for all participants. No visit to Sevierville is complete without stopping at one of Dolly’s favorite hangouts, Red’s Ice Cream Fountain. Indulge in their famous homemade ice cream, crafted with love and brimming with nostalgic flavors. A sweet finale to your PhotoFAST tour, this charming stop promises a delightful treat and picture-perfect memories!

image.alt: Smoky Mtn, Sevierville, Dandridge Douglas Dam & Bush's Bean Tour
